Detailed Description

Utility class for ploting a variable varying in time.

TODO: make it more general accessible from other classes and also from Python.

Member Function Documentation

void FootTriggerPlotter::addPoint ( float  dTime  ) 

Adds a new (uninitalised) point to the curves.

Use the setData method to actually set the curves data for this point.

Parameters:
dTime frame delta time
